definition: cooking by direct exposure to radiant heat (as over a fire or under a grill), to cook under a broiler
details:
noun
- cooking by direct exposure to radiant heat (as over a fire or under a grill)
= synonyms: broiling, grilling
verb
- to cook under a broiler
= example: to cook under a broiler
= synonyms: oven broil
- to heat by a natural force
= example: to heat by a natural force
- to be very hot, due to hot weather or exposure to the sun
= example: to be very hot, due to hot weather or exposure to the sun
= synonyms: bake
